20021113

If you open the properties of schema entry you get a NullPointerException

STEPS
1) Open the attached schema file
2) Select enablement
3) Select and
4) Pop up the menu and select proeprties. The perspective will close

Created an attachment (id=2405)
Decorators schema file
This makes the schema editor unusable.

The problem was due to the unresolved references. None of the elements defined 
in the 'enablement' content model were defined elsewhere in the schema, so the 
editor choked on trying to fetch the schema object from a non-existent 
referenced element. 

We fixed it by asking the enclosing compositor object for schema instead. In 
addition, we are now flagging the unresolved refrerenced using error overlay 
icon.

The fix is in HEAD (both org.eclipse.pde.core and org.eclipse.pde.ui are 
affected).
